about_the_game:
Play as an existing or fully customisable political figure, and campaign for the German federal elections of 2025 or many other alternative elections! In "Vox Populi: Germany 2025", you and the characters around you must promote your ideas and your popularity throughout the country to claim victory!

  • Choose from a host of different scenarios that place the country in various realistic or fictional situations on different dates.
  • Recruit your campaign team from a variety of characters, based on their ideologies or traits.
  • Act directly on your nation's regions or demographic groups to impact their political opinions and voting intentions.
  • Adapt your strategy to the actions of your opponents and place obstacles in their path.
  • Face the many unforeseen events that will shake up the country's political life.
  • Influence and organise national referendums to change voting rules, territorial integrity or laws that directly benefit you.
  • Collect enough seats in the future Bundestag to ensure your influence on the nation's destiny.
  • Collect dozens of cards that will help you in the great national debates.
  • Take part in alternate history scenarios that place the country in unchronic situations.
  • Play as an alien or a defender of humanity in a variety of fictional science fiction scenarios.

This game includes:

  • 11 different scenarios, past or future, many with randomisation for replayability, adapted to the country's history and politics
  • Uchronic scenarios that change the past history of the country and create new contemporary situations.
  • Science fiction scenarios with their own characters, regions, traits, ideologies, corpuses and events
  • A detailed, fully customisable character creator
  • Dozens of pre-existing or randomly generated characters
  • Dozens of unique ideologies and corpuses
  • A realistic subdivision of Germany into regions and demographic categories, each with its own characteristics
  • Flexible character actions that allow for a wide variety of gameplay
  • 120 unique events
  • Dozens of character traits that influence their actions or debates
  • 50 varied cards for dynamic debates between characters
  • 60 possible referendums, fundamentally influencing gameplay or providing various advantages to candidates
  • A unique system of parliament and political coalitions based on the ideologies of each candidate
  • Detailed collections of data and statistics to track the evolution of the electorate and your campaign
  • And much more to discover!
